CreatePipeline.title: CreatePipeline
CreatePipeline.summary: Creates a pipeline. A pipeline consists of a series of nodes that form a directed acyclic graph (DAG), which defines the machine learning process.

GetPipeline.title: GetPipeline
GetPipeline.summary: Queries the information about a pipeline.

GetPipelineRun.title: GetPipelineRun
GetPipelineRun.summary: Queries the information about a pipeline job.

GetPipelineRunNode.title: GetPipelineRunNode
GetPipelineRunNode.summary: Queries information about a node. A pipeline job contains a variety of nodes.

ListPipelineRunNodeLogs.title: ListPipelineRunNodeLogs
ListPipelineRunNodeLogs.summary: Obtains the node logs of a pipeline job.

ListPipelineRunNodeOutputs.title: ListPipelineRunNodeOutputs
ListPipelineRunNodeOutputs.summary: Queries the outputs of a pipeline node.

ListPipelineRunNodeStatus.title: ListPipelineRunNodeStatus
ListPipelineRunNodeStatus.summary: Queries the running status of a pipeline node.

ListPipelineRuns.title: ListPipelineRuns
ListPipelineRuns.summary: Queries a list of pipeline jobs. Filtering, sorting, and pagination are supported for this API operation.

ListPipelineRunsStatus.title: ListPipelineRunsStatus
ListPipelineRunsStatus.summary: Queries the statuses of multiple pipeline jobs or nodes at a time.

UpdatePipeline.title: UpdatePipeline
UpdatePipeline.summary: Updates the definition of a pipeline.

UpdatePipelineRun.title: UpdatePipelineRun
UpdatePipelineRun.summary: Updates a pipeline job. You can update only the name of a pipeline job.
